column5: Finally managed to get out to what was an awesome day! Water was super clear and the fish were hungry.            Can't wait till this weekend! Hope the rain goes away.
Well done man.  Looks like a beautiful day in the big ditch.   Nice fish!!
Good on ya.  I've got nothing but bad luck on that river it seems.
Great job Joseph Got to love it when the fishes are hungry Thanks for sharing Leechman
Man, those are nice. I especially like the browns. Thanks for showing them.
How is it in the smaller boat I always wanted to go there with my 14'er but was always worried about it .Nice fish guys
nice day on the water congrats

That is the reason I am so eager to get out to the Niagara and do some fishing. I talked to some buddies and we are going to be booking a guided tour sooner then I thought. Very nice fish there that make me more excited about the trip.
My buddy Dave looks cold in those pics, lol!!!!
Good job guys  Always nice to see some niagara steel
Encouraging report guys!  Amazed to know that there are still lots of Brown out there, aside from Steelie.
Looks like a great trip, well done.  That water looks nice and calm, just the way I like it  Joey
